entry.title: Heavy Rain Watch
entry.summary: A slow-moving convergence line may develop within the area, bringing heavy rain. Thunderstorms may be possible this evening. Rainfall accumulations could approach warning criteria for a part of the region. Chance of upgrading to a Warning: Moderate.

author.name: Meteorological Service of New Zealand Limited

entry.title: Severe Thunderstorm Watch
entry.summary:
Unstable conditions are expected to generate intense showers this afternoon and into the evening. These showers may be accompanied by downpours and damaging hail.
Large hail can cause significant damage to crops, orchards, vines, glasshouses and vehicles, as well as make driving conditions hazardous. Rainfall of this intensity can cause surface and/or flash flooding, especially about low-lying areas such as streams, rivers or narrow valleys, and may also lead to slips.
